body_html:
Hi @satendrapratap ,
I think this issue is about VocabularyProcessor. if only SP_TEST is set, then there isn't any call to VocabularyProcessor.fit_transform. in SP_TEST you call VocabularyProcessor.transform. that creates a dependency to your train code.
Could you please move VocabularyProcessor related logic outside of train and test functionality?

body:
Hi @satendrapratap ,
I think this issue is about VocabularyProcessor. if only SP_TEST is set, then there isn't any call to VocabularyProcessor.fit_transform. in SP_TEST you call VocabularyProcessor.transform. that creates a dependency to your train code.
Could you please move VocabularyProcessor related logic outside of train and test functionality?
